text: Ka sε: Nyamesom ho Nwomanimfoͻ, momra (ma yenyina) asεm baako pε a εda yεn ne mo ntεm no so: (Ɛnesε), εmma y’εnnsom (obiara) gyesε Nyankopͻn nko ara, na εmma yεnnnfa biribiara nso mmata Neho, na εmma yennnfiri Nyankopͻn akyi mmfa yεn ho-yεn-ho nnyε awuranom (nnsom wͻn). Na sε wͻ’dane wͻn akyi dema (Nokorε no) a, εneε monka nkyerε wͻn sε: “Moni ho adanseε sε, yε’deε yε’yε Muslimifoͻ”
